The Quranic researcher, with warning, is a resignation that is a marketer for what is for the sake of which they are given this asymmel It was said: What do they do until they get that high level?It was said: They will die, etc., and I am useful that it is normal for the patience, and with that, it is amended from Awfwa to the harms of the despair and the significance of the one who is the one who is the one All the duties are the knowledge of what he promised with the first way and the sign of the text, for whoever is exempt from what he answered on himself was the fulfillment of what God has answered, and he is upon him and God is upon him and for him What is required of what was narrated from Qutdah, and for the honor and the Mujahid of his eagerness on the backs, they said: That is, if they were vowed to obey it, then do it and fear it, then it was a day, then it was a day.Spreading in the train, the end of the wise of the boundary and the dawn, and it is more informed of the fleeing because the increase in the building indicates the increase in the meaning, and the request is also a sign of that It is to be overwhelmed by it.And in their description of that, there is a notice of their good deeds and their gendiograms from tinkers.
